name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mixl Free - Focus App w/Agent, Pomodoro Timer, Binaural Beats, Siteblocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get more done with Mixl, the AI daily planner that uses behavioral science to increase focus while you work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block distractions with Mixl, the AI focus app with an Adaptive Siteblocker that uses behavioral science to increase your focus while you work.

You begin the day saying, "I’ll get so much done today." But distractions quickly creep in as you get sucked into an endless scroll of videos and social media. Escape the doomscrolling cycle with Mixl.

Mixl is a focus agent that:

🎯 Sets clear SMART goals 
💪 Replaces your Pomodoro timer, binaural, and site-blocking tools with an interactive and intelligent agent to help you get more out of work and life.
📈 Improves your focus score as you work
📊 Tracks your biometric data to suggest the best times for breaks, ensuring you relax and stay productive when you need it most.

Mixl puts you in control of your focus and efficiency.


साइट ब्लॉकर , उत्पादकता , Bloqueador de sitios, Productividad, サイトブロッカー , 生産性, חוסם אתרים, פרודוקטיביות
